name: Jax
description: A massive Half-Orc with dull, olive skin and a face crossed by a single, deep crater-like scar on his forehead. He wears simple, tattered mining leathers and a heavy leather apron. His hands are massive and clumsy, but he moves with a surprising, gentle care. He carries a heavy iron shovel and a small, humming frequency-charms around his neck. He smells of damp earth and old grease.
bio: Jax was part of the original sabotage-attempt on the steam-valves, driven by a cultist's promise of 'Ascension'. After being captured and healed of his mental corruption by Silvara, he has dedicated his life to manual labor as a form of penance. He is often seen clearing the most dangerous rubble-piles.
motivation: Redeeming himself through hard labor; ensuring that no others fall to the 'False-Song'.
